1.	You may ask the volunteers for hints at any point while solving the clue(s).

 2.	You are allowed to ask three hints at the most; after 5, 10, and 15 minutes after the time of your arrival at the location.

 3.	As you have been briefed about, weâ€™re timing your Hunt ever since you began. For each hint asked for all the rounds except ROUND 1, an additional time of 5, 7, and 10 minutes respectively shall be added to your total time for the corresponding hint taken. There will be NO TIME PENALTY for each of the 3 hints for ROUND 1 (The team to have the minimum total time at the end of CodeHunt wins).

 4.	Neither hints nor time penalties shall be given after the third hint is exhausted. You may still try solving the clue.
